frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description: This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

perks.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Rasmussen ISA

perks.description:
Lightweight sight. Short zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Meyrin RDS

perks.description:
Superior scope. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Meyrin RDL

perks.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage
perks.name: Accelerated Coils

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
  •  Increases impact damage
  •  Slower charge time
perks.name: Liquid Coils

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description: Grants reduced charge time and increased handling speed for a short time immediately after swapping to this weapon.
perks.name: Backup Plan

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights

perks.description: Energy matched shield explosion disorients nearby combatants.
perks.name: Shield Disorient

perks.description: This weapon gains increased airborne effectiveness as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Air Assault

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Improved accuracy and range on the opening shot of attack.
perks.name: Opening Shot

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage

perks.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
perks.name: Kill Clip

perks.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.
perks.name: High-Impact Reserves

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: Melee final blows reload this weapon's magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Grave Robber
